extension_description.message: Transform TED into the most sophisticated English learning tool

toggle_play_and_pause_shortcut.message: Toggle play and pause shortcut key

subtitle_disabled.message: Mask the English subtitle when accessed or reloaded

translation_disabled.message: Mask the translation when accessed or reloaded

pause_sentence_by_sentence_enabled.message: Enable pause-sentence-by-sentence when accessed or reloaded
